WorkItem.ClosedComment: In the current version of Rawr3, If you select the Model, it will update Class, selecting Class does not limit Model (was a usability feature we added). Loading characters will update both class and model.
WorkItem.Description:
On the stats page the contents of the model drop down is not dependent on the selected class, which means I can select weird combinations like druid and mage model. Race drop down is also completely independent from selected class.
Â 
MacOS 10.5.7
Safari 4.0.2 & Firefox 3.0.13
Silverlight plugin 3.0.40818.0
WorkItem.Summary: [Base] Class and Model dropdowns are not linked

Comments.Message: Rather than open a new issue, since they might be related: These two dropdowns are also not auto-selected when loading a character from the Armory.
